nodes.description: McArdle作为IRA成员于1996年2月参与策划并实施伦敦南码头卡车炸弹袭击
nodes.support_text: James McArdle, 29, was part of an IRA team responsible for detonating a massive lorry bomb in February 1996

nodes.description: 爆炸造成2人死亡、150人受伤及1500万英镑经济损失，导致IRA停火协议破裂
nodes.support_text: which killed two, injured 150 and spectacularly brought an end to their 18-month ceasefire

nodes.description: McArdle两次驾驶改装卡车：首次至Carlisle进行伪装采购，二次携带1吨自制炸药
nodes.support_text: McArdle twice drove the converted car transporter used in the attack from Belfast to the mainland. On the first 'dummy run'... Three weeks later McArdle was behind the wheel once more

nodes.description: 袭击后IRA成员在Barking河岸丢弃证据并逃离现场
nodes.support_text: once there they stopped off at waste ground in River Road, Barking, Essex, where the trailer... was abandoned and incriminating evidence dumped

nodes.description: 目击者Arthur Ward于爆炸后第199通电话报警，协助警方锁定目标车辆
nodes.support_text: An intensive police hotline following the blast received 850 calls. The 199th call came from Arthur Ward... who had spotted the bomb lorry

nodes.description: 警方通过指纹证据和车辆追踪还原袭击全过程
nodes.support_text: Crucially they managed to find three of McArdle's thumb prints

nodes.description: McArdle被正式起诉并接受两轮谋杀指控（含未指认同伙保护家人）
nodes.support_text: McArdle was finally brought to trial following a meticulous investigation

nodes.description: Woolwich Crown Court陪审团于庭审后首次达成爆炸阴谋罪的有罪裁决
nodes.support_text: the jury at London's Woolwich Crown Court convicted him of one charge of conspiring

nodes.description: 陪审团继续 deliberations，需最终裁决两起谋杀指控
nodes.support_text: The jury was sent home last night to continue deliberating

nodes.description: IRA恐怖分子协助安放炸弹
nodes.support_text: IRA恐怖分子协助安放炸弹

nodes.description: 法院向公众披露案件细节
nodes.support_text: 法院向公众披露案件细节

nodes.description: McArdle否认指控

nodes.description: 法官告知陪审团接受多数裁决

nodes.description: 法庭听取控方主张

nodes.description: 控方坚持McArdle在恐袭中起关键作用

edges.support_text: which killed two, injured 150 and spectacularly brought an end to their 18-month ceasefire
James McArdle, 29, was part of an IRA team responsible for detonating a massive lorry bomb in February 1996
警方调查使侦探能够拼凑车辆历史
An intensive police hotline following the blast received 850 calls
once there they stopped off at waste ground in River Road, Barking, Essex
Crucially they managed to find three of McArdle's thumb prints
McArdle was finally brought to trial following a meticulous investigation
the jury at London's Woolwich Crown Court convicted him
The jury was sent home last night to continue deliberating
庭审后法官告知陪审团多数裁决
